roleset.name: torture, event of torturing

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The Barre dictatorship simply is limited in the amount of people [0]-1 it can torture and kill *trace*-1.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: It hurts to think of how many wonderful people in Iraq at the academic community , lawyers , human rights activists , civilians , intellectuals , people -- would now be alive , who have been horribly murdered and tortured and reduced to misery since by a half application of violence through sanctions and overflights .
example.arg: by a half application of violence through sanctions and overflights

example.name: with CAU
example.text: The former shows that intellectuals in Taiwan need no longer fear torture and imprisonment for their beliefs .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Hospitalised MDC youths narrate their torture at he hands of hired Zanu PF thugs.
example.arg: at he hands of hired Zanu PF thugs.

example.name: both args, different syntactic arrangment
example.text: In 1997 the German murderers Ernst Dieter Korzen and Stefan Michael Mahn recorded their torture of two prostitutes whom they had kidnapped.
example.arg: of two prostitutes whom they had kidnapped.

example.name: with MNR
example.text: You recount the torture of prisoners with electricity by Seattle police in the 1920's.

example.name: with MNR
example.text: are you saying we shouldn't have prosecuted Japanese soldiers for the water torture of our own soldiers in WWII?

roleset.note: TORTURE-V NOTES: VN class amuse-31.1. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from torture.01-v)
TORTURE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on torture-v.01. Corresponds to VN class amuse-31.1. (from torture.01-n)
